hero.subtitle: Leverage AI to perfectly match your resume with your dream job. Get insightful analysis, generate tailored documents, practice interviews, and connect with a powerful alumni network.

features.title: All The Tools You Need to Succeed
features.subtitle: From crafting the perfect resume to acing the interview and building your network, JobMatch AI provides a comprehensive suite of tools.

analyzer.title: AI Resume Analyzer
analyzer.description: Get deep insights into your resume's match with job descriptions, ATS compatibility, and keyword optimization.

writer.title: AI Resume & Cover Letter Writer
writer.description: Generate tailored resumes and compelling cover letters in minutes with AI assistance.

feed.title: Engaging Community Feed
feed.description: Share insights, ask questions, participate in polls, and connect with your peers.

rewards.title: Gamified Rewards & Progress
rewards.description: Earn XP, unlock badges, and see your progress on the leaderboard as you engage.

builder.title: Resume Templates & Builder

tracker.title: Comprehensive Job Tracker

prep.title: Interview Preparation Hub
prep.description: Practice with AI mock interviews, browse a vast question bank, and take custom quizzes.

connect.title: Alumni Connect Directory
connect.description: Network with fellow alumni, find mentors, and book appointments for career guidance.

events.title: Event Management & Gallery

trending.subtitle: Explore the most in-demand roles and industries our alumni are thriving in.

blog.title: From Our Blog

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: {platformName} is a platform that uses AI to optimize resumes, prepare for interviews, and connect with alumni networks.
faq.q2: How does AI Mock Interview work?
faq.a2: AI Mock Interview generates questions based on your job role and evaluates your answers with detailed feedback.
faq.a3: Yes, you can start using {platformName} for free. Premium features are available with subscription plans.
faq.q4: Can I customize my resume templates?
faq.a4: Absolutely! JobMatch AI provides customizable templates to suit your needs.
